snippet.title: Living World Racing (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Living World Racing (PS2) - Character: Mr. Mouse - Cup: Drops

The flying HMS Boat transports pets to Living World, a wonderfully lustrous utopian heaven of green grass, shrubs, flowers, trees, animal homes, mini towns as well as special levels with a fun fair or a ski resort! The annual Living World Challenge Cup Race is due to start and all the contestants are fully geared up to race around the track and take the coveted Cup home.
Each character individually races in powerful fan-propelled hover boats and can reach lightening fast speeds under turbo boost, whizzing around tracks, collecting the various speed-ups and nutritional snack points along the way. The levels get progressively harder with devious combinations of tight corners, steep hills, ramps, narrow bridges, dangerous cliff edges and whirling tornados. Race in both single-player and multi-player modes, learn your skills in practice races and time trial mode, then challenge yourself in various difficulty settings, weather conditions and the 3 championship cups!
